feedback.fit: The loose, relaxed fit is comfortable and breezy for summer. Consider tucking in the blouse slightly to define your waist more.
feedback.color: The pale yellow and coral color combination is soft and feminine. Adding a contrasting accessory color could make it pop more.
feedback.footwear: The wedge sandals elongate your legs nicely. A metallic or nude shade could also work well.
feedback.accessories: The straw hat and shoulder bag suit the casual chic vibe. A bold statement necklace or earrings could elevate the look.
feedback.style: Overall this is a cute, put-together casual summer outfit. Small tweaks could take it from good to great.

feedback.fit: The slim fit of the sweater and shorts creates an elongated silhouette that flatters your figure.
feedback.color: The neutral beige and brown tones are balanced nicely by the light blue denim. The color palette has an earthy feel.
feedback.footwear: The lace-up boots add an edgy, grungy element that contrasts well with the chunky knit. They also make your legs look great.
feedback.accessories: The knit beanie and fringe bag enhance the boho vibe. Some layered necklaces could be a nice addition.
feedback.style: This outfit strikes a good balance between boho and grunge styles. It's casual but still very fashionable and intentional.

feedback.fit: The tailored fit of the blazer and skirt create a very polished, put-together look that highlights your figure beautifully.
feedback.color: The bright orange, royal blue and white colorblocking is bold and eye-catching. The colors complement each other well.
feedback.footwear: The black ankle boots ground the outfit without competing with the colorful garments. A colorful shoe could also be fun.
feedback.accessories: This look could be elevated with the addition of some modern, artistic jewelry pieces and perhaps a sleek clutch.
feedback.style: The colorblock styling feels very contemporary and fashion-forward. It's a great way to make a statement with solid separates.

feedback.fit: The relaxed fit is easy and effortless. Defining the waist a bit more, either with the crop top or belting the shorts, would flatter your shape.
feedback.color: The coral and tan color scheme is pretty but a bit bland. Adding a third contrasting color would give the outfit more life.
feedback.footwear: The wedge sandals work with the boho aesthetic. A metallic or embellished sandal could dress this up a notch.
feedback.accessories: The pendant necklace and fringe bag suit the boho style. Some armful of bangles or a floppy hat would complete the look.
feedback.style: This outfit captures casual boho style but could use a few small tweaks to really make it shine and feel more intentional.

feedback.fit: The cropped tank and high-waisted skirt create a lengthening effect on your torso. The flowy asymmetrical skirt drapes beautifully.
feedback.color: The lime green, cobalt blue and white colorblocking is unique and eye-catching. The bright colors are perfect for summer.
feedback.footwear: The strappy black sandals add a delicate, feminine touch without competing with the bold skirt. Great choice.
feedback.accessories: A few modern, artistic accessories like geometric earrings or a cuff bracelet could elevate this even more.
feedback.style: The colorblock styling feels fresh, youthful and fashion-forward. It's a confident and stylish summer look.

feedback.fit: The oversized tee and flowy harem pants create a relaxed, effortless silhouette. Tucking or knotting the tee could define your shape more.
feedback.color: The bold red, white and blue color scheme has a nice nautical vibe. The bright red pants are a great statement piece.
feedback.footwear: The chunky platform sandals give you some height and make the voluminous pants work well. A sleek ankle boot could also work.
feedback.accessories: The metallic envelope clutch and bangle bracelets dress up the casual separates. A long pendant necklace would look great too.
feedback.style: This look mixes casual pieces with glam accessories for an elevated take on relaxed style. It's comfortable but still very stylish.

feedback.fit: The fitted puff sleeve blouse highlights your shoulders and arms. The belted paperbag waist accentuates your figure beautifully.
feedback.color: The bright yellow and orange hues scream summer fun. Pairing them with crisp white keeps the look fresh and light.
feedback.footwear: The neutral wedge sandals elongate your legs and don't compete with the vibrant outfit. Strappy sandals could also work well.
feedback.accessories: The straw visor and woven tote are perfect beachy accessories. Some colorful statement earrings would be a fun addition.
feedback.style: This outfit has tropical resort wear written all over it. It's colorful, breezy and makes you look like you're on a fabulous vacation.

feedback.fit: The oversized sweater looks cozy but swallows your figure. Tucking it in slightly or belting it would create better proportions.
feedback.color: The mustard yellow and light blue is an interesting color combo. Adding a third color, like olive green, could make it more dynamic.
feedback.footwear: The purple sneakers add an unexpected pop of color and a sporty vibe. They're a fun, casual choice that's still fashionable.
feedback.accessories: Some casual accessories like a baseball cap, crossbody bag, or layered necklaces could take this basic outfit up a notch.
feedback.style: The outfit has a casual, sporty feel but is a bit plain. Tweaking the fit and adding accessories would make it more stylish.

feedback.fit: The sleeveless blouse and flowy pleated skirt create an elegant, feminine silhouette. The midi length is very flattering.
feedback.color: The red, orange and white color scheme is striking and chic. The warm tones complement your skin and hair beautifully.
feedback.footwear: The neutral espadrille flats are a comfortable, stylish choice that grounds the airy skirt. Ankle-wrap flats would also be cute.
feedback.accessories: The sun hat adds a touch of French Riviera glamour. A woven handbag and some delicate jewelry would complete the look.
feedback.style: This outfit exudes Parisian chic style with the flowy midi skirt and classic color palette. It's timeless and sophisticated.

feedback.fit: The relaxed fit of the button-down and flowy skirt is comfortable and modest. Tucking in the shirt would polish it up a bit.
feedback.color: The olive green, burgundy and white color scheme has a classic, academic vibe. The deep tones are perfect for fall.
feedback.footwear: The white ballet flats keep the look delicate and feminine. Loafers or ankle boots could give it a more substantial base.
feedback.accessories: The beret is a chic touch that suits the scholarly aesthetic. A leather satchel and watch would also be nice additions.
feedback.style: This outfit has a studious, academic feel with the pleated skirt, button-down and beret. It's a smart, refined casual look.
